1.「……ククク。そうだったのか。| この修行をこなすとは やはり| お前は ポルフ: ...Kukuku. Was that so? To complete this|training, you are Polfan's disciple after all.

2.「オレも かつては あいつの弟子だった。| 言うなれば お前の兄弟子ってとこだな: I used to be his disciple. In other words, I|was your brother.

3.「知ってるか？ <pc>。| この修行をこなした奴だけが| 伝説の旅芸人に 近づ: Do you know?　<pc>. Only those who|complete this training can come close to|becoming a legendary minstrel?

4.「オレも 修行を終えたところだ。| あの時は勝ちをゆずったが 今 この時において: I just finished my training. I gave up the win|then, but at this moment in time, you and I|are evenly matched.

5.「フハハ！ オレは 誰にも止められねえ！| いずれ最強となり 世の中から恐れられ: Ha-ha-ha! Nothing can stop me! I will become|the most powerful and legendary minstrel the|world has ever feared!

6.「人を笑わせるだけで 満足してるような| ふぬけた旅芸人をブッ殺してよおお！！|: Kill those minstrels who are content just to|make people laugh! I'll show the world that|tricks don't work!

7.「……芸で 人なんか救えねえ。: You can't save people with tricks.

8.「頭に たたきこんでおけ。<pc>。| ポルファンは 人ひとり救えねえ クズ芸人: It is the only one for your head.|<pc>. Polfan is a scumbag comedian|who can't even save a single person.
